text:
FL-Home System Application

Problem & Motivation
Senior citizens, who are often unfamiliar with the complexities of modern cyber security, are particularly vulnerable to cyberattacks.
Phishing
Malware
Identity theft
Etc.

These vulnerabilities not only compromise their personal information but also pose significant risks to their financial and emotional well-being.
There is an urgent need for accessible and user-friendly tools that can safeguard this demographic from malicious online activities.
Solution & Novelty
A user-friendly app designed to monitor and manage smart home systems for senior citizens.

The app provides a centralized platform where users can oversee all connected devices, receive alerts about unusual activities, and control device settings to enhance security.

Security features include automatic updates and encryption of data transmissions.

The smart system securely collects via Federated Learning (FL) and analyzes data with from multiple users to identify common settings, preferences, and needs among seniors with specific health conditions.

Utilizes cloud resources such as AWS or Chameleon Cloud to empower machine learning algorithms, training, and testing. 

The app is designed to provide an intuitive interfaces with voice command capabilities, cross-platform support with various IoT applications and systems, and intuitive UI customization to tailor to any userâ€™s appeal and handicap.
